data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Richards, William J., Yato, Takuji (2014): Revision of the subgenus Parapterygotrigla (Pisces: Triglidae: Pterygotrigla). Zootaxa 3768 (1): 23-42, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.1.2
